auth.name: ApiKey
auth.doc: Used for authenticating requests before session-based authentication is available

props.name: token
props.doc: The textual representation of this api key

props.name: name
props.doc: Name given to identify this api key

auth.name: EmailValidationPurpose
auth.doc: An enumeration for purposes an email validation may be used for

auth.name: EmailValidationAttempt
auth.doc: Represents an attempted email validation, and the possible response / success

props.name: purposeId
props.doc: Id of the purpose this email validation is used for

props.name: email
props.doc: Email address being validated

props.name: token
props.doc: Token sent with the email, which is also used for validating the email address

props.name: resendToken
props.doc: Token used for authenticating an email resend attempt
Id of the user who claims to own this email address

props.name: completed
props.doc: Time when this attempt was finished successfully. None while not completed.

auth.name: EmailValidationResend
auth.doc: Represents a time when an email validation was sent again

auth.name: DeviceToken
auth.doc: Used as a refresh token to generate device-specific session tokens on private devices

props.name: deviceId
props.doc: Id of the device this token provides access to
Id of the user who owns this token and presumably the linked device, also

props.name: token
props.doc: Textual representation of this token
Time when this device use was started / authenticated
Time when this token was invalidated, if applicable

auth.name: SessionToken
auth.doc: Used for authenticating temporary user sessions

props.doc: Id of the user who owns this token

props.name: token
props.doc: Textual representation of this token

props.name: deviceId
props.doc: Id of the device on which this session is, if applicable

props.name: modelStylePreference
props.doc: Model style preferred during this session
Time when this session was started
Time when this token expires

props.name: loggedOut
props.doc: Time when this session was ended due to the user logging out. None if not logged out.
Id of the user who owns this password
User's hashed password
